name: ViewColumn
text:
type ViewColumn = {
    index: number,
    name?: string,
    isVisible?: boolean,
    isFrozen?: boolean,
    toggle?: () => void
}

value.text:
{
    index: number,
    name?: string,
    isVisible?: boolean,
    isFrozen?: boolean,
    toggle?: () => void
}

markdown:
Describes the columns as rendered in your markup.

The index indicates the column order and allows the view to perform dom manipulation (toggle column visibility, set frozen columns).
